title: Relais & Châteaux Luxury Under the Caribbean Sun
description: The white-sand beaches of the Caribbean are calling: discover the untouched beauty of Cap Cana in the Dominican Republic, with a stay at the luxurious Eden Roc at Cap Cana - a stunning beachfront Relais & Châteaux property. Spend five nights in this tropical paradise and enjoy daily breakfast, a welcome drink on arrival, a personal golf cart to travel around the resort, a generous USD $250 credit to be used towards food and beverages, spa treatments or golf course fees, and return airport transfers from Punta Cana airport.
location_description: Eden Roc at Cap Cana - DO NOT USE
offer_address: Cap Cana, Cap Cana, 23000 Punta Cana, Dominican Republic
